jobs.title: Senior Product Manager Human Expression & Blade Excellence
jobs.description:
For over 75 years, BIC has been creating ingeniously simple and joyful products that are a part of every heart and home.

As a member of our team, you'll be a part of reigniting a beloved brand as we continue to reimagine everyday essentials in new, sustainable and responsible ways.

Our "roll up your sleeves and get the job done" approach to work creates an environment where self-starters, problem solvers and innovative thinkers thrive. BIC team members are empowered to take ownership of their careers and bring their unique perspectives to the table to make a meaningful impact on our mission.

It's a colorful world - make your mark by joining the BIC team today.

We strive to provide a comprehensive benefits package that supports the well-being and professional growth of our team members. As a member of Team BIC, you’ll have access to a range of benefits designed to enhance your physical, emotional and financial wellness. In many of our locations, we offer team members:
• Competitive... compensation and recognition
• Hybrid work environment and flexible approach to work
• Retirement and financial savings options
• Well-being and mental health support
• Parental leave
• Physical well-being initiatives and health insurance plans
• Professional development opportunities
• Volunteer opportunities

Overview:

As a Senior Product Manager Human Expression & Blade Excellence you will be responsible for developing and implementing the long term strategy and annual marketing plans at Italian level for both Stationery and Shaver categories, incorporating all aspects of marketing mix, while securing a profitable growth for BIC and increasing consumer preference for our brand.

Main responsibilities:
• Define Long term strategy and yearly marketing plans in the framework of EU strategy and local long-term vision
• Define categories marketing communication objectives in order to develop and implement marketing and promotional plans covering ATL & BTL actions
• Responsible for product portfolio management, defining the appropriate product mix and price positioning per channel based on customer and consumer needs
• Proactively explore and unlock new opportunities to maximize growth
• Use market data available to evaluate trends, opportunities or threats and turning those numbers into actions and strategic decisions while setting the longer-term directions
• Acquire and in depth understanding of the route to market, to establish proper channel strategies.
• Responsible for brand support budget setting, control and reporting
• Manage the business securing profitability and increasing ROI
• Key contributor in sales forecasting in co-operation with planning and sales teams being liable for accuracy
• Cross-departmental clear and constant communication along with the proper coordination in order to ensure smooth implementation of plans
• Collaboration and alignment with HQ marketing team in order to secure validation of the plans and alignment with EU strategy
• Assess product market data, evaluating information coming from field, store visits, meetings with customers, aiming in developing the categories
• Manage directly 3 Product Managers

Qualifications:
• University degree on Economics with a post-graduate degree in marketing
• 6-8 years of experience in a Marketing related positions preferably in FMCG company
• Excellent level of English language both spoken and written
• Proficiency in MS Office programs (Word, Excel, Power Point)
• Strong interpersonal and communication skills
• Inclination towards innovation, challenge the status quo and think out of the box
• Strong strategic and analytical skills
• Hands-on approach, high motivation, curiosity, enthusiasm and "going the extra mile" mindset
• Exposure to sales, trade marketing and category management is a plus

jobs.title: Brand Manager
jobs.description:
Please Note: If you are a current Spin Master employee with access to Workday, apply to this job via the Workday application.

Are you a kid at heart looking to build a career with a leading global children's toy, entertainment and digital gaming company?

At Spin Master, our unwavering commitment to open mindedness, integrity and innovation is a great part of what has made us an industry leader. How do we stay ahead of the pack? By hiring the best and brightest minds—and that’s why we want you!

Job Description

What will you work on?

As a Brand Manager you will be responsible for marketing strategies of existing brands and future brand launches with the goal to develop and grow a business which will generate a sustainable and profitable business for the long term. The Brand Manager is responsible for developing and executing Marketing strategies including brand plans, product line selection, above and below line plans and trade marketing execution.

How will you create... impact?

Brand Strategy/Implementation
• Co-develop and implement the Spin Master brand strategies including all aspects of the marketing mix/tools.
• Define the product line considering the competitive landscape and retail environment.
• Grow our market shares in a sustainable way by launching new brands.
• Support in maintaining the TLP (toy line projection) together with quota management.
• Drive effective brand plans to communicate the brand and to develop and execute sales driven consumer promotions.
• Optimize the on-line web-opportunities in an effective and creative way.
• Strong alignment with the European brand teams, the support teams in Bratislava and the Global Business Units in US and Canada.

Budget Management
• Manage and control the marketing budget for your respective brands regarding all above and below the line activities.

Marketing services / PR
• Align with the PR agency what the most appropriate PR activities are in order to support your brands.
• Coordinate with the respective marketing services agency the development/execution of the required material they will develop/produce (POS material, adaptations etc.).
• Have a detailed understanding of the kids media landscape and know how to interpret/ validate the recommendations from the agencies.

Market/consumer knowledge
• Gain a thorough understanding of the Spin Master brands and be able to benchmark this with the market situation.
• Ensure to keep the organization up to date with trends and changes in the competitive landscape.

How will you fit into the team?
• Creative mind set in combination with a hands-on attitude
• Strong written, verbal and presentation skills
• Demonstrated ability to manage multiple projects and prioritize work without missing critical deadlines
• Ability to both adapt to and manage changing priorities independently in a fast paced environment
• Strong interpersonal skills and ability to work effectively within a team environment
• Proven ability to do whatever it takes to get the job done while taking initiative and pushing projects forward under tight deadlines
• A strong level of passion and willingness to be awesome
• Passionate about creative excellence and willing to drive self and others to achieve “magic”
• Domestic and International travel required at times
• What are your skills and experience?
• University or Bachelor Degree
• 2 years branded consumer marketing experience, preferably in the kids/toys industry
• Experience with the toy trade
• Experience in an international working environment so the person knows what it takes to deal with international marketing teams and a head quarter abroad
• Intermediate to advanced knowledge of MS Office, coupled with excellent organizational communication skills, and customer service skills
• Fluent in English written and verbal

and

What You Can Expect From Us

Our mission is to Make Life More Fun with a vision to push the boundaries of innovation, creativity, and fun.
• Growth and Career Opportunities
• Flexible Work Hours
• Innovation, Collaboration and Fun
• Comprehensive Benefits
• Other fun Perks!

What’s it like to work here?

Spin Master is a fast-paced, hands-on organization that provides many great opportunities for impactful decision-making; though our challenging start-up atmosphere isn’t for everyone, we have a proven record of opportunities for future advancement and internal transfers for our passionate and results driven team.

Everyone is welcome in our sandbox and we are committed to an accessible and inclusive hiring process that provides reasonable accommodation to all applicants.

Spin Master strives to create an accessible and inclusive application and selection process and is committed to working with and providing reasonable accommodation to job applicants who may require provisions to participate in the recruitment, selection and/or assessment processes. Should you require an accommodation, please contact our Talent Acquisition team, by email at JobsEU@spinmaster.com and we will work with you to meet your accessibility needs.

• Eccellenti doti comunicative e interpersonali, con abilità comprovate nella gestione della leadership.
• Capacità di lavorare in team multidisciplinari e di gestire più progetti contemporaneamente.
• Conoscenza approfondita delle best practices aziendali e delle tecnologie emergenti.

Offriamo Opportunità di Crescita e Sviluppo

Sede e Dettagli del Contratto

La sede principale è situata in un'area strategica a livello nazionale, con possibilità di spostamenti presso altre sedi e clienti. Il contratto sarà definito in base alle competenze e all'esperienza del candidato selezionato.

Come Presentare la Candidatura

jobs.title: Communications Manager
jobs.description:
Why Deliveroo?

Our mission is to transform the way you shop and eat, bringing the neighbourhood to your door by connecting consumers, restaurants, shops and riders. We are transforming the way the world eats and shops by making access to food and products more convenient and enjoyable. We give people the opportunity to buy what they want, as they want it, when and where they want it.

We are a technology-driven company at the forefront of the most rapidly expanding industry in the world. We are still a small team, making a very large impact, looking to answer some of the most interesting questions out there. We move fast, value autonomy and ownership, and we are always looking for new ideas.

Communication Manager

Reporting to the Head of Communications and Public Affairs Italy & Belgium, you will play an important and leading role in helping Deliveroo protect and build its reputation.

You will have an interest in the media, government and current affairs, and enjoy working across... communications and public affairs day-to-day.

The role is based in Rome.

What you’ll do:
• Support the Head of Communications and Public Affairs with all media relations in Italy, including handling incoming media queries from the national print and broadcast media
• Support the Head of Communications and Public Affairs with the creation of positive business announcements and creative partnerships and campaigns, focused on the most important areas of Deliveroo policy - e.g. healthy eating, supporting Deliveroo riders, CSR and ESG programmes
• Identify new and interesting opportunities for Deliveroo to build its corporate reputation in the national and local and trade media and build relationships with a network of journalists
• Support the Head of Communications and Public Affairs with the creation of positive consumers stories, working with an external agency, coordinating with the international Consumers Team and with the local Marketing teams.
• Create high-quality briefing materials to support the GM, Management Team and the rest of the Italian Team with media interviews and meetings, and all corporate-related internal briefing documents.

What we’re looking for:
• Experience in corporate PR (in-house/agency), working in Parliament/government or a related organisation (e.g. a leading think tank).
• An in-depth understanding of the Italian media and political landscape with an excellent antenna for successful stories and a desire to work on current policy issues which are at the top of the news agenda.
• A track-record of landing positive corporate and consumer coverage in the national and regional media and building successful campaigns which have made a genuine impact, with a focus on CSR/ESG.
• You will be comfortable in communicating complex and sensitive policy issues to multiple senior partners and national media.
• You will bring an existing network of media contacts to the role.
• Very good English skills

Life at Deliveroo

We are a growing team, with very large impact, looking to answer some of the most interesting questions out there. We move fast, we're always looking for new ideas and we're very transparent about the decisions we make and why we make them.

Benefits And Diversity

At Deliveroo we know that people are the heart of the business and we prioritise their welfare. We offer different great benefits including community, convenience, growth, time away and relocation.We believe a great workplace is one that represents the world we live in and how beautifully diverse it can be. That means we have no judgement when it comes to any one of the things that make you who you are - your gender, race, sexuality, religion or a secret aversion to coriander.

jobs.title: R&D Project Manager
jobs.description:
The R&D Project Manager is responsible for day-to-day management including but not limited to managing projects through the NPD Stage Gate process – Initiate, Plan, Execute, and Close.

The R&D Project Manager will implement project management tools, dashboards, and metrics to successfully facilitate and deliver on the NPD project portfolio within Fluid Solutions South (FSS) of Watts Water Technologies, Inc.

Responsibilities And Duties

Project Management:
• Lead new product development efforts utilizing the Stage Gate process from concept to post-launch
